text: Turn back… this path is not meant for you.

speaker: Player
text: Who are you? Why are you blocking the road?

speaker: Hector
text: My name is Hector. I once walked the same road… and paid the price.

speaker: Hector
text: Beyond the woods lies something ancient—something that awakens tonight.

speaker: Player
text: I can't turn back. Someone I care about is out there.

speaker: Hector
text: Then take this lantern. Its light may not save you… but it will help you see the truth.

speaker: Player
text: Thanks… I guess. Wish me luck.

speaker: Hector
text: Luck won't help you where you're going. Only courage.
